Deprecated API

Contents

  • Deprecated Interfaces
  • Deprecated Classes
  • Deprecated Fields
  • Deprecated Methods
  • Deprecated Constructors
  • Deprecated Interfaces 
    Interface and Description
    com.bumptech.glide.module.GlideModule
    Libraries should use LibraryGlideModule and Applications should use AppGlideModule.
  • Deprecated Classes 
    Class and Description
    com.bumptech.glide.integration.okhttp.OkHttpGlideModule
    replaced with com.bumptech.glide.integration.okhttp3.OkHttpGlideModule.
    com.bumptech.glide.integration.okhttp3.OkHttpGlideModule
    Replaced by OkHttpLibraryGlideModule for Applications that use Glide's annotations.
    com.bumptech.glide.integration.okhttp.OkHttpStreamFetcher
    replaced with com.bumptech.glide.integration.okhttp3.OkHttpStreamFetcher.
    com.bumptech.glide.integration.okhttp.OkHttpUrlLoader
    replaced with com.bumptech.glide.integration.okhttp3.OkHttpUrlLoader.
    com.bumptech.glide.integration.volley.VolleyGlideModule
    Replaced with VolleyLibraryGlideModule.
  • Deprecated Fields 
    Field and Description
    com.bumptech.glide.load.model.Headers.NONE
    Use Headers.DEFAULT instead.
  • Deprecated Methods 
    Method and Description
    com.bumptech.glide.RequestBuilder.downloadOnly(int, int)
    Use RequestManager.downloadOnly() and RequestBuilder.into(int, int).
    com.bumptech.glide.RequestBuilder.downloadOnly(Y)
    Use RequestManager.downloadOnly() and RequestBuilder.into(Target).
    com.bumptech.glide.gifdecoder.GifDecoder.getLoopCount()
    Use GifDecoder.getNetscapeLoopCount() instead. This method cannot distinguish whether the loop count is 1 or doesn't exist.
    com.bumptech.glide.util.Util.getSize(Bitmap)
    Use Util.getBitmapByteSize(android.graphics.Bitmap) instead. Scheduled to be removed in Glide 4.0.
    com.bumptech.glide.RequestBuilder.into(int, int)
    Use RequestBuilder.submit(int, int) instead.
    com.bumptech.glide.RequestBuilder.load(URL)
    The URL class has a number of performance problems and should generally be avoided when possible. Prefer RequestBuilder.load(android.net.Uri) or RequestBuilder.load(String).
    com.bumptech.glide.GlideBuilder.setDecodeFormat(DecodeFormat)
    Use GlideBuilder.setDefaultRequestOptions(RequestOptions) instead.
    com.bumptech.glide.GlideBuilder.setDiskCache(DiskCache)
    Creating a disk cache directory on the main thread causes strict mode violations, use GlideBuilder.setDiskCache(com.bumptech.glide.load.engine.cache.DiskCache.Factory) instead. Scheduled to be removed in Glide 4.0.
  • Deprecated Constructors 
    Constructor and Description
    com.bumptech.glide.load.resource.bitmap.BitmapDrawableTransformation(Context, BitmapPool, Transformation<Bitmap>)
    use BitmapDrawableTransformation.BitmapDrawableTransformation(Transformation)}
    com.bumptech.glide.load.resource.bitmap.BitmapDrawableTransformation(Context, Transformation<Bitmap>)
    use BitmapDrawableTransformation.BitmapDrawableTransformation(Transformation)}
    com.bumptech.glide.load.resource.bitmap.BitmapTransformation(BitmapPool)
    com.bumptech.glide.load.resource.bitmap.BitmapTransformation(Context)
    com.bumptech.glide.load.resource.bitmap.CenterCrop(BitmapPool)
    com.bumptech.glide.load.resource.bitmap.CenterCrop(Context)
    com.bumptech.glide.load.resource.bitmap.CenterInside(BitmapPool)
    com.bumptech.glide.load.resource.bitmap.CenterInside(Context)
    com.bumptech.glide.load.resource.bitmap.CircleCrop(BitmapPool)
    Use CircleCrop.CircleCrop()
    com.bumptech.glide.load.resource.bitmap.CircleCrop(Context)
    Use CircleCrop.CircleCrop().
    com.bumptech.glide.load.resource.bitmap.FitCenter(BitmapPool)
    Use FitCenter.FitCenter().
    com.bumptech.glide.load.resource.bitmap.FitCenter(Context)
    Use FitCenter.FitCenter().
    com.bumptech.glide.load.resource.gif.GifDrawableTransformation(Context, Transformation<Bitmap>)
    Use GifDrawableTransformation.GifDrawableTransformation(Transformation).
    com.bumptech.glide.load.resource.gif.GifDrawableTransformation(Transformation<Bitmap>, BitmapPool)
    Use GifDrawableTransformation.GifDrawableTransformation(Transformation)
    com.bumptech.glide.load.resource.bitmap.RoundedCorners(BitmapPool, int)
    Use RoundedCorners.RoundedCorners(int)
    com.bumptech.glide.load.resource.bitmap.RoundedCorners(Context, int)
    Use RoundedCorners.RoundedCorners(int)
